attributes.action: bring awareness to a life long condition and regular blood checks increase injections for patients who need them at the moment only one injection every threemon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PA is a life long and life threatening condition that has been forgotten by health professionals. we need awareness and support of the devastating effect this has on people, treatment varies between gps and the government limit 2-3 months injections not everyone is the same and as a sufferer i need more injections and more knowledge of what to expect.THERE IS NO CURE.
